document_data.name: Pick
document_data.Usage: It was considered essential for excavating ore.
document_data.Varieties:
* [[Serrated pick]]s, a type of pick that was similar to the standard variety but had longer, more saw-like heads.
* [[War pick]]s, otherwise known as military picks, were picks adapted and designed for the purposes of warfare.

Notable Users.Regions & Settlements: * Pickaxes were one of many tools considered useful for traveling through the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]].<ref>
